orders.no_orders: you haven't placed any orders yet.

activate_account.benefits: sign up for an account to take advantage of order history as well as pre-filled forms during checkout on subsequent orders.
activate_account.subtext: to activate your account, choose a password and enter it below.

addresses.no_address_html: you don't have any addresses saved to your account. speed up your checkout process by adding a {{ new_address }}.

general.subscribe_form_success: great, got it. we'll be ready to spill the beans soon.

hero_section.subtitle: This is the featured promotion section.
hero_section.text: Use this area to promote a single item with an image on the right.

full_width_section.text: You can have up to three full width features that can contain a large image or video and an optional call to action button.

alternating_features_section.text: You can have up to three alternating left/right features with an option to align media to the left/right and include a call to action below:

inline_features_section.text: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

testimonials_section.first_quote: Aenean eu leo quam. Pellentesque magna fringilla justo ornare sem lacinia quam venenatis vestibulum. Etiam tristique lorem adipiscing tortor porta sem malesuada magna euismod.
testimonials_section.second_quote: Maecenas sed diam eget risus varius blandit sit amet non magna. Aenean lacinia bibendum nulla sed consectetur. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, adipiscing elit.

featured_products_section.no_collection_text_html: You haven't selected a collection yet! Go to the {{ theme_settings_link }} and select a collection.
featured_products_section.no_products_in_collection_text_html: No products in this collection. Go to the {{ collection_screen_link }} and add some products.
featured_products_section.no_products_in_shop_text_html: Your store doesn't have any products yet! {{ new_product_link }} now.

order_now_section.text_html: You haven't selected a product yet. Head to the {{ theme_settings_link }} to take care of that.

customer_account.have_an_account_label: already have an account with ALMOST PEGGY?
customer_account.save_my_information_label: save this information for next time.

stock.title: inventory issues.
stock.items_unavailable_notice: some products have become unavailable and your cart has been updated. we apologise for any inconvenience.

order_summary.title: order summary.
order_summary.show_discount_form_link_label: have a discount? click here to enter it.
order_summary.cart_does_not_meet_discount_requirements: your card does not meet the requirements for {{ code }} discount code.
order_summary.discount_requires_customer_notice: please submit your shipping information to apply {{ code }} discount code.
order_summary.customer_does_not_meet_discount_requirem: customer information does not meet the requirements for {{ code }} discount code.
order_summary.shipping_information_does_not_meet_disco: your shipping information does not meet the requirements for {{ code }} discount code.
order_summary.customer_already_used_once_per_customer_: the {{ code }} discount code has already been used.

shipping.title: shipping method.
shipping.waiting_on_rate_notice: please wait while we fetch available shipping rates.
shipping.no_rates_for_cart_or_destination_notice: there are no shipping rates available for your cart destination.
shipping.no_rates_for_country_notice: we don't offer shipping to {{ country }}.
shipping.shipping_line_phone: your courier may use this number to contact you.

payment.title: payment method.
payment.show_gift_card_form_link_label: have a gift card? click here to enter it.
payment.card_security_notice: all transactions are secure and encrypted. credit card numbers are never stored.
payment.card_expiry_aria_description: expiry date format: month month, year year
payment.free_order_notice_html: your order is free. no payment required.
payment.offsite_gateway_redirect_hint: you will be redirected to {{ gateway_label }} to complete your purchase securely.
payment.no_js_credit_card_fields_redirect_hint: you will be redirected to a payment gateway in order to add your payment information.
payment.card_fields_processing_error: an error occurred while processing the payment information. please try again later.

order_covered_by_gift_cards_notice.one: your order is covered by your gift card.
order_covered_by_gift_cards_notice.other: your order is covered by your gift cards.

field_errors.email_invalid: please enter a valid email address.
field_errors.address_address2_blank: please enter your apt, suite, etc.
field_errors.address_phone_blank: please enter a valid telephone number.
field_errors.address_zip_blank: please enter your zip / postal code.
field_errors.address_zip_invalid_for_country: please enter a valid zip / postal code for {{ country }}
field_errors.address_zip_invalid_for_country_and_prov: please enter a valid zip / postal code for {{ province }}, {{ country }}
field_errors.credit_card_name_blank: please enter your name as shown on the credit card.
field_errors.credit_card_number_invalid: please enter a valid credit card number.
field_errors.credit_card_expiry_invalid: please enter a valid expiry date.
field_errors.credit_card_month_invalid: please enter a valid expiry month.
field_errors.credit_card_year_invalid: please enter a valid expiry year.
field_errors.credit_card_start_invalid: please enter a valid start date.
field_errors.credit_card_start_month_invalid: please enter a valid start month.
field_errors.credit_card_start_year_invalid: please enter a valid start year.
field_errors.reduction_code_code_not_found: this code did not match any active gift card or discount. was it entered correctly?
field_errors.shipping_line_phone_blank: to use this delivery method, you need to enter your mobile telephone number.
field_errors.shipping_line_phone_invalid: to use this delivery method, you need to enter a 10 digit mobile telephone number.
field_errors.gift_card_already_applied: this gift card has already been applied to your order.
field_errors.gift_card_disabled: looks like this gift card is no longer available.
field_errors.gift_card_expired: looks like this gift card has expired.
field_errors.gift_card_depleted: looks like there are no remaining funds on this gift card.
field_errors.gift_card_currency_mismatch: only gift cards purchased in {{ checkout_currency }} can be applied to this order.

payment_errors.generic_error: there was an error processing your payment. please try again.
payment_errors.rejected_transaction: the payment provider rejected the transaction. please try again.
payment_errors.credit_card_processing: we are experiencing technical difficulties while trying to process your credit card. please try again in a few minutes.
payment_errors.order_total_changed: the total of your order has been changed. please make sure you are aware of the changes before completing your order.
payment_errors.payment_processing: there was a problem with the payment service. please select a different payment method or try again later.

shipping_errors.shipping_method: your cart has been modified and the shipping rate your previously selected no longer applies. please select a new rate.

processing.redirecting_notice: please wait while we redirect you.
processing.continue_to_payment_gateway_notice: continue to payment gateway to add your information.
processing.continue_to_payment_gateway_notice_error: your payment information contains errors. return to payment gateway to correct them.
processing.title: processing order.

wait.long: you'll receive an email as soon as your order's processed. there's currently a high volume of orders.
wait.no_auto_refresh_html: if you're not automatically redirected, refresh this page.

medium.one: your order's being processed. estimated wait time 1 minute.
medium.other: your order's being processed. estimated wait time is {{ count }} minutes.

thank_you.title: thank you for your purchase!
thank_you.confirmation_email_sent_text: a confirmation email has been sent to {{ email }}.
thank_you.thank_you_description_html: we've accepted your order and we're getting it ready. a confirmation email has been sent to {{ email }}. come back to this page for updates on your order status.
thank_you.confirmed_description_html: we've accepted your order and we're getting it ready. a confirmation email has been sent to {{ email }}. come back to this page for updates on your shipment status.
thank_you.in_transit_title: your shipment is on its way.
thank_you.in_transit_description: come back to this page for updates on your shipment status.
thank_you.in_transit_description_days: you should receive your package in the next {{ number }} days.
thank_you.in_transit_description_today: you should receive your package today.
thank_you.no_tracking_number: there is no tracking number for this package.
thank_you.out_for_delivery_title: your shipment is out for delivery.
thank_you.out_for_delivery_description_html: your shipment is on the delivery truck - expected to arrive today. if you still haven't received it in the next 2 days, please {{ contact_us }}.
thank_you.attempted_delivery_title: an attempt was made to deliver your shipment.
thank_you.attempted_delivery_description_html: an attempt was made to deliver your shipment but it was unsuccessful. please {{ contact_us }} to arrange another delivery time.
thank_you.delivered_description_html: your shipment has been delivered to the address provided. if you haven't received it, or if you have any other problems, please {{ contact_us }}.
thank_you.failed_contact_merchant: according to {{ company }} your shipment couldn't be delivered as planned. please contact {{ company }} to arrange another delivery attempt.
thank_you.failed_contact_merchant_no_company: your order couldn't be delivered as planned. please contact us to arrange another delivery attempt.
thank_you.login_title: log in to view all shipment details.
thank_you.login_description: you can find your order number in the receipt you received via email.
thank_you.cancelled_description: your order was cancelled on {{ date }}. please contact us if you have any questions.
thank_you.unfulfilled_items_description: we are currently preparing these items for shipment.

errors.verify_email: we have sent an email to {{ customer_email }}, please click the link included to verify your email address.
errors.reset_password_html: this email address is already associated with an account. if this account is yours you can reset your password.
errors.gift_card_depleted: there are no funds left on this gift card.
errors.gift_card_already_applied: code has already been applied to your checkout.
errors.credit_card_session_expired: credit card authorisation has expired, please enter your payment information again. your card has not been charged.
errors.discount_expired: this discount is not valid anymore.
errors.discount_limit_reached: this discount has reached its usage limit.
errors.discount_not_found: unable to find a valid discount matching the code entered.
errors.discount_once_per_customer_used: this discount has reached its usage limit.

customer.no_account_found: no account found with that email.

cart.items_changed: one or more items have changed.
cart.product_sold_out: the product {{ name }} has already sold out.
cart.shipping_address_not_required: this cart does not require shipping.
cart.all_items_in_cart: all {{ count }} {{ name }} are in your cart.

addresses.confirm: are you sure you wish to delete this address?
